mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation_tbl(res_code, res_state, res_date, res_hour, employee_code, user_id, res_detail_code, res_regDate, host_code) VALUES ('RS'||res_seq.currval, #{res_state}, #{res_date}, #{res_hour}, #{employee_code}, #{user_id}, 'RS'||res_seq.currval, SYSDATE, #{host_code})

INSERT INTO reservation_detail_tbl(res_detail_code, res_cnt, res_indiv_request, product_code, res_memo, res_sales) VALUES ('RS'||res_seq.nextval, #{res_cnt}, #{res_indiv_request}, #{product_code}, null, #{res_sales})
mapper.select: SELECT r.res_code, r.host_code, c.comp_res, r.res_state, r.res_date, res_cnt FROM reservation_tbl r, reservation_detail_tbl rdt, company_tbl c WHERE c.host_code = r.host_code AND rdt.res_detail_code = r.res_detail_code AND res_code = #{res_code}
